hints.content:
[[☃ image 1]]

The factory built $\purpleD{12}$ bulldozers last month.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number built and the vertical axis labeled Vehicle. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Bulldozer, Garbage truck, Convertible, and Motorcycle. The bar line for each Vehicle shows the following: Bulldozers bar line labeled 12 extends to 12, Garbage truck bar line extends to 4, Convertible bar line extends to 12, and Motorcycle bar line extends to 16. A purple line is drawn up from 12, which reaches to the end of the Bulldozer bar line labeled 12. !

hints.content:
[[☃ image 1]]

The factory built $\blueD{4}$ garbage trucks last month.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number built and the vertical axis labeled Vehicle. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Bulldozer, Garbage truck, Convertible, and Motorcycle. The bar line for each Vehicle shows the following: Bulldozers bar line extends to 12, Garbage truck bar line labeled 4 extends to 4, Convertible bar line extends to 12, and Motorcycle bar line extends to 16. A blue line is drawn up from 4, which reaches to the end of the Garbage truck bar line labeled 4. !

hints.content:
[[☃ image 1]]

The factory built $\greenD{12}$ convertibles last month.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number built and the vertical axis labeled Vehicle. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Bulldozer, Garbage truck, Convertible, and Motorcycle. The bar line for each Vehicle shows the following: Bulldozers bar line extends to 12, Garbage truck bar line extends to 4, Convertible bar line labeled 12 extends to 12, and Motorcycle bar line extends to 16. A green line is drawn up from 12, which reaches to the end of the Bulldozer bar line and to the end of the Convertible bar line labeled 12. !

hints.content:
[[☃ image 1]]

The factory built $\redC{16}$ motorcycles last month.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number built and the vertical axis labeled Vehicle. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Bulldozer, Garbage truck, Convertible, and Motorcycle. The bar line for each Vehicle shows the following: Bulldozers bar line extends to 12, Garbage truck bar line extends to 4, Convertible bar line extends to 12, and Motorcycle bar line labeled 16 extends to 16. A red line is drawn up from 16, which reaches to the end of the Motorcycle bar line labeled 16. !

hints.content: The factory built $44$ vehicles last month.

question.content:
The graph shows the number of vehicles built at an auto factory last month.


[[☃ image 1]]

**How many vehicles did the factory build last month in all?**

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] vehicles

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number built and the vertical axis labeled Vehicle. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Bulldozer, Garbage truck, Convertible, and Motorcycle. The bar line for each Vehicle shows the following: Bulldozers bar line extends  to 12, Garbage truck bar line extends to 4, Convertible bar line extends to 12, and Motorcycle bar line extends to 16. !
